message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product that I think would be perfect for you.  I'm asking $120 for it.  What do you think?
Thank you for offering the product, Alice. I appreciate your suggestion, but I was hoping to stay within a budget of $100. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $100?
Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal.  I'm willing to come down a bit to $110.  This still gives us both some room to make a mutually beneficial agreement. What do you think?
